characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: A Thunderfire Cannon can only fire its ranged weapon if a friendly CHAPTER Techmarine Gunner is within 3". A single Techmarine Gunner cannot operate multiple Thunderfire Cannons in this way in a single turn. If, at any point, there are no Techmarine Gunners within 6" of a Thunderfire Cannon, it immerdiately shuts down and it removed from play.
